alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 12 at 2:50AM EST until November 12 at 3:15AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN BROOME...SOUTH CENTRAL CHENANGO AND CENTRAL SUSQUEHANNA COUNTIES... At 250 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sanitaria Springs to near Hop Bottom, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kirkwood, Conklin, Jackson, Susquehanna, Coventry, Susquehanna Depot, Montrose, Dimock, Harford and Hallstead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
